placeholderImages.description: A freshly baked focaccia with cranberries and serrano ham on a wooden board.
A scoop of vibrant mango sorbet in a chilled glass, garnished with a mint leaf.
Pan-fried gyoza dumplings arranged on a plate with a side of soy dipping sauce.
Plated ravioli with a creamy pink sauce, garnished with fresh herbs.
Golden-brown yuca croquettes served with a creamy avocado dip.
A slice of elegant Fraisier cake with layers of sponge, cream, and fresh strawberries.
A slice of inverted cheesecake with a berry compote and pink chocolate shavings.
A small glass of creamy rose liqueur with a dehydrated orange slice on the rim.
Diagram showing the life cycle of Tenebrio molitor: eggs, larva, pupa, and adult beetle.
